entry.title: SPSPA02
entry.summary:
Vendor: STARMAXDESIGN
Type:
Price: 0.00

Polyester sound-absorbing panel is a decorative material with a sound-absorbing function made by hot pressing. It has the properties of high density, environmental protection, fire protection, wide sound-absorbing frequency band, strong decorative properties, simple construction, easy cutting, and no dust pollution. They have a wide selection of colors, which can well meet the needs of diversification. Architectural acoustics and decoration needs. Therefore, polyester fiber sound-absorbing panels are mostly used in opera houses, theaters, recording studios, audition rooms, TV stations, conference rooms, studios, gymnasiums, hotels, KTV, and other places with strict acoustic requirements.
